paper_abstract: This paper improves the integrated DEA model proposed for finding the most efficient DMUs introduced by Amin and Toloo, [Amin, Gholam R., Toloo, M. (2007). Finding the most efficient DMUs in DEA: An improved integrated model. Computers & Industrial Engineering, 52(2), 71-77]. The paper shows the problem of using the integrated DEA model and presents an improved integrated IDEA model for determining a single efficient unit. Also the paper indicates the property of the improvements mathematically and a numerical example shows the usefulness and intelligibility of the study. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Comments on finding the most efficient DMUs in DEA: An improved integrated model
